text:
Unable to select our templates! Can anyone advise? We have a number of page templates in a folder. When I try to switch a website page to a different template, I can see *some* of the templates. When I try to switch a landing page to a different template, I see *other* templates. They all live in the same folder. All have very similar declarations at the top,
```<!--
    templateType: page
    label: Home Page
    isAvailableForNewContent: true
    enableDomainStylesheets: false
-->```
Why am I sometimes seeing some templates, and other times seeing a different set?
Hi Chuck. Was this template made the “old way”? .. From my experience, you’re not able to switch from old way templates to the new “themes” templates.
